meanings.definition: A substance that gives color to paint, ink, etc.
meanings.sent1: The artist mixed different pigments to create a beautiful painting.
meanings.sent2: The pigments in the ink made the writing on the paper stand out.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child thought the pigments in the paint were magical and could make things come alive.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a burst of colorful pigments painting the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant pigments of the sunset painted the sky in hues of orange and pink.

meanings.definition: Any substance used to color other materials.
meanings.sent1: The company imported various pigments to dye their fabrics.
meanings.sent2: Natural pigments from plants were used to color the pottery.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally spilled the pigments for the cake frosting and turned the kitchen into a rainbow.
meanings.sent4: His words were like pigments, adding depth and meaning to her life.
meanings.sent5: The pigments of autumn leaves transformed the landscape into a breathtaking masterpiece.
